comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT has a snippet indicating that he came to the States from London in April 1913. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A04E1DF103BE633A... and later that month, Osler gave lectures at Yale. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9805E0DB1F3AE633A... By this time the Canadian Osler was a professor of medicine at Oxford, having been on the faculty of Johns Hopkins and McGill earlier in his career.
